Class SpecificationMongoRepository<T,ID>

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.support.SimpleMongoRepository<T,ID>
me.julb.springbootstarter.persistence.mongodb.configurations.support.SpecificationMongoRepository<T,ID>
All Implemented Interfaces:
MongoSpecificationExecutor<T>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<T>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,ID>
public class SpecificationMongoRepository<T,ID> extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.support.SimpleMongoRepository<T,ID> implements MongoSpecificationExecutor<T>
The mongo repository implementation with specification executor.
